message:
Before the end of the next decade, unmanned aerial vehicles no bigger than a dragonfly and faster than a hummingbird will be darting in and out of buildings.

FLASHBACK: "Before the end of the next decade, unmanned aerial vehicles no bigger than a dragonfly & faster than a hummingbird will be darting in & out of buildings."

http://www.airforcetimes.com/news/2009/06/airforce_uas_automation_061009w/
